price: Kuwa ni ukumbusho. Wala Sisi hatukuwa wenye kudhulumu.
footnotes: Wakumbuke na wazingatie. Wala si shani yetu kudhulumu hata tuuadhibu umma kabla ya kuwaletea Mtume.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
